item.title: Elvis Presley - Blue Hawaii
item.description:
For Educational Use. Key of G: A7, Hawaiian D7, G, Cm, E7, G7, D, D+. The D+ is an uncommon chord..make sure to practice it before starting the song!
The original recording is in A (a version in this key was created, too). the pitch has been lowered to G...and no, Elvis did not have a cold while singing it.
The original YouTube video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p2h0f1VgDrM
The ukulele font comes from Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com
